variable.name: observation_number
variable.description: 1st, 2nd, 3rd, etc. observation of a particular subject

variable.name: case_cont
variable.comment: "Cases" are subjects with chronic Pseudomonas aeruginosa (P.a.); "Controls" are subjects who never showed P.a. positive cultures in consecutive quarters, or only late in life.
variable.value: Neither (subject's affection status not formally determined)

variable.name: pft_pheno
variable.comment: Degree of pulmonary impairment (lung disease severity).
variable.value: Neither (subject's pft phenotype not formally determined)

variable.name: date
variable.description: Date of FEV measurement on subject (year)
variable.comment: SUBJID and date uniquely identify row.

variable.name: ht
variable.description: Height (cm) of subject on FEV measurement date

variable.name: age
variable.description: Age of subject at measurement, rounded to nearest year

variable.name: fev1
variable.description: Forced Expiratory Volume (liters) in 1 sec (max of 3 trials)
